mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, B.OnSale AS orderPlatformOnSale, C.OnSale AS onlineSaleOnSale,sd.setStock FROM [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_View] A LEFT JOIN [YHSROrderPlatform].[dbo].[YHSR_OP_ShoesInfo] B ON A.Seq = B.Shoes_Seq AND B.Del = 0 LEFT JOIN [YHSROnlineSales].[dbo].[YHSR_OLS_ShoesInfo] C ON A.Seq = C.Shoes_Seq AND C.Del = 0 LEFT JOIN (SELECT Shoes_Seq,SUM(SetStock) AS setStock FROM [YHSROnlineSales].[dbo].[YHSR_OLS_ShoesData] GROUP BY Shoes_Seq) sd ON sd.Shoes_Seq = A.Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Period_Seq IN (${periodSeqs})
AND A.Category_Seq IN (${categorySeqs})
AND (A.GoodName LIKE '%${goodNameId}%' OR A.GoodID LIKE '%${goodNameId}%')
AND B.OnSale = 0
AND C.OnSale = 0
AND B.OnSale = 1
AND C.OnSale = 1
AND (B.OnSale IS NOT NULL OR C.OnSale IS NOT NULL)
select Seq FROM [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].YHSR_Goods_Category where ParentSeq = #{categorySeq} and Del = 0
select * FROM [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].YHSR_Goods_Category WHERE ParentSeq = #{seq} and Del = 0
select gp.Seq FROM [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].YHSR_Base_User bu LEFT JOIN [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].YHSR_Goods_Period gp on bu.Brand_Seq = gp.Brand_Seq WHERE bu.Seq = #{userSeq} and gp.Del = 0

select gs.Seq as seq, gs.Period_Seq as periodSeq, gs.Category_Seq as categorySeq, gc.Name as categoryName, gs.GoodName as goodName, gs.GoodID as goodId, gs.SX1 as sx1, gs.SX2 as sx2, gs.SX3 as sx3, gs.SX4 as sx4, gs.SX5 as sx5, gs.SX6 as sx6, gs.SX7 as sx7, gs.SX8 as sx8, gs.SX9 as sx9, gs.SX10 as sx10, gs.SX11 as sx11, gs.SX12 as sx12, gs.SX13 as sx13, gs.SX14 as sx14, gs.SX15 as sx15, gs.SX16 as sx16, gs.SX17 as sx17, gs.SX18 as sx18, gs.SX19 as sx19, gs.SX20 as sx20, gs.Introduce as introduce, gs.Description as description, gs.Video as video, gs.Img1 as img1, gs.Img2 as img2, gs.Img3 as img3, gs.Img4 as img4, gs.Img5 as img5, gs.InputTime as inputTime from [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].YHSR_Goods_Shoes gs LEFT JOIN [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].YHSR_Goods_Category gc on gs.Category_Seq = gc.Seq WHERE gs.Seq=#{seq} and gs.Del = 0
